```{r}
library("blockrand")
library("knitr")
library("dplyr")
```

```{r}
listr <- NULL
for (l in 1:15){
strat <- paste0("centre ",l)
listp <- blockrand(n=32,
                   stratum = strat,
num.levels = 2,
id.prefix='patient_',
block.sizes = sample(1:6,16, replace = TRUE) ,
levels=c("A", "B")
) 
listr <- rbind(listr,listp)
}
write.csv2(listr,"randomisation_kinepanch_2.csv", row.names = FALSE) 
```
